text: Eliot Spizzirri (born 23 December 2001) is an American tennis player. Spizzirri won the 2019 US Open – Boys' Doubles title with fellow American Tyler Zink. He currently plays college tennis at the University of Texas. ==Junior Grand Slam titles== ===Doubles: 1 (1 title)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !Result !Year !width=80|Tournament !Surface !width=80|Partner !width=150|Opponents !width=80|Score |- style="background:#ccf;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Winner |2019 |US Open |Hard | Tyler Zink | Andrew Paulson Alexander Zgirovsky |7–6(7–4), 6–4 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Stamford, Connecticut Category:Texas Longhorns men's tennis players Category:US Open (tennis) junior champions Category:Grand Slam (tennis) champions in boys' doubles Category:Tennis people from Connecticut
title: Eliot Spizzirri
